item.description:
THIS IIS THE YEAR TO MAKE 2013 A FUN AND MEMROABLE ONE ALWAYS WANTED TO TRY THIS!! HAVE IT CROSS POSTED TOTOAL OF 60 WILL BE JOINING US!!!

If you you have never been tubing you have to try this - it is like a roller coaster in the snow and Amesbury is one of the best in the area. The snow is well groomed and the location is easy to find - it IS a ride but the ride is worth it.

We will meet at the park,. spend a morning tubing, hopefully have plenty of hot beverages, and then can head out for lunch - or not.

A 3-hour pass is $24 and a 5-hour pass is $30.

I am looking for an assistant organizer/Host for this event - let me know if you are interested in helping - it is easy to help.

 

 

http://www.amesburysportspark.net

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: LETS GO TUBING----------DRESS WARM
